document_data.mainbody:
Strukkat Stephammer was an experienced dwarvish artificer-for-hire from the city of Neverwinter, active in the late 15 century DR.
By the late 15 century DR, Strukkat Stephammer had years worth of experience in artificery. However, he began experiencing failing eyesight, which diminished his capabilities to a degree. Despite that, he was still a skilled and hard worker. He made a living by selling his armorers services to the adventurers and defenders of Neverwinter.
